vulnerability_findings.name: use-ownable2step
vulnerability_findings.message: By demanding that the receiver of the owner permissions actively accept via a contract call of its own,  `Ownable2Step` and `Ownable2StepUpgradeable` prevent the contract ownership from accidentally being transferred  to an address that cannot handle it.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-custom-error-not-require
vulnerability_findings.message: Consider using custom errors as they are more gas efficient while allowing developers  to describe the error in detail using NatSpec.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-short-revert-string
vulnerability_findings.message: Shortening revert strings to fit in 32 bytes will decrease gas costs for deployment and  gas costs when the revert condition has been met.

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
vulnerability_findings.message: Pausable.pause (Pausable.sol#151-154) should be declared external

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
vulnerability_findings.message: Pausable.unpause (Pausable.sol#159-162) should be declared external

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in Pausable.sol:
	- pragma solidity0.5.12 (Pausable.sol#3): it allows old versions
	- pragma solidity0.5.12 (Pausable.sol#100): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_account' of Ownable.isManager (Pausable.sol#51) is not in mixedCase

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_newOwner' of Ownable.transferOwnership (Pausable.sol#59) is not in mixedCase

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_account' of Ownable.setManager (Pausable.sol#79) is not in mixedCase

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_account' of Ownable.removeManager (Pausable.sol#90) is not in mixedCase
